name: twilight-vscode-extension
description: The intelligent tooling to use Salla's Twilight Theme Engine in your VSCode editor.
author: Salla App (https://github.com/SallaApp)

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.braceLin.description: If true an empty line will be inserted after opening curly braces and before closing curly braces.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.bracePad.description: Inserts a space after the start of a container and before the end of the container if the contents of that container are not indented; such as: conditions, function arguments, and escaped sequences of template strings.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.braces.description: Determines if opening curly braces will exist on the same line as their condition or be forced onto a new line.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.commentL.description: If a blank new line should be forced above comments.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.comments.description: This will determine whether comments should always start at position 0 of each line or if comments should be indented according to the code.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.compress.description: If CSS should be beautified in a style where the properties and values are minifed for faster reading of selectors.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.correct.description: Automatically correct some sloppiness in code.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.cssInser.description: Inserts new line characters between every CSS code block.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.elseLine.description: If else_line is true then the keyword 'else' is forced onto a new line.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.endComma.description: If there should be a trailing comma in arrays and objects. Value multiline only applies to modes beautify and diff.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.forceAtt.description: If all markup attributes should be indented each onto their own line.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.forceInd.description: Will force indentation upon all content and tags without regard for the creation of new text nodes.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.formatAr.description: Determines if all array indexes should be indented, never indented, or left to the default.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.formatOb.description: Determines if all object keys should be indented, never indented, or left to the default.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.function.description: If a space should follow a JavaScript function name.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.indentSt.description: Choose to indent using tabs or spaces.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.indentLe.description: How much indentation padding should be applied to beautification? This option is internally used for code that requires switching between libraries.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.tabSize.description: 0 will default to the editor's tab size. Stores the number of 'inchar' values to comprise a single indentation.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.methodCh.description: When to break consecutively chained methods and properties onto separate lines. A negative value disables this option. A value of 0 ensures method chains are never broken.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.neverFla.description: If destructured lists in script should never be flattend.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.newLine.description: Insert an empty line at the end of output.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.noCaseIn.description: If a case statement should receive the same indentation as the containing switch block.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.noLeadZe.description: Whether leading 0s in CSS values immediately preceeding a decimal should be removed or prevented.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.objectSo.description: Sorts markup attributes and properties by key name in script and style.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.preserve.description: The maximum number of consecutive empty lines to retain.
Prevent comment reformatting due to option wrap.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.quoteCon.description: If the quotes of script strings or markup attributes should be converted to single quotes or double quotes.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.space.description: Inserts a space following the function keyword for anonymous functions.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.spaceClo.description: Markup self-closing tags end will end with ' />' instead of '/>'.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.tagMerge.description: Allows immediately adjacement start and end markup tags of the same name to be combined into a single self-closing tag.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.tagSort.description: Sort child items of each respective markup parent element.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.ternaryL.description: If ternary operators in JavaScript ? and : should remain on the same line.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.unformat.description: If markup tags should have their insides preserved. This option is only available to markup and does not support child tokens that require a different lexer.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.variable.description: If consecutive JavaScript variables should be merged into a comma separated list or if variables in a list should be separated.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.vertical.description: If lists of assignments and properties should be vertically aligned. This option is not used with the markup lexer.

Salla.twilight-vscode-extension.wrap.description: Character width limit before applying word wrap. A 0 value disables this option. A negative value concatenates script strings.
